trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de methode die wordt afgehandeld tijdens de <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> en <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"> </xref> gerouteerde gebeurtenissen, evenals gerelateerd gekoppeld en gebeurtenissen te bekijken.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: Deze gemachtigde wordt gebruikt met de volgende gekoppelde gebeurtenissen:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>Deze gemachtigde is ook worden gebruikt met de volgende gerouteerde gebeurtenissen op basis van elementen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Deze gerouteerde gebeurtenissen doorsturen van de eerder vermelde gekoppelde gebeurtenissen zodat ze beter toegankelijk voor het model algemene element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>Gekoppelde gebeurtenissen en de gebeurtenissen basiselement gerouteerd delen hun gebeurtenisgegevens en de vastleg- en versies van de gerouteerde gebeurtenissen tunneling ook delen van gegevens van gebeurtenissen.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Dit kan de verwerkte kenmerken van de gebeurtenis be√Ønvloeden doorheen de gebeurtenisroute.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: Als de <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>gebeurtenis of de <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>gebeurtenis wordt verwerkt (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> is ingesteld op `true` in de gebeurtenisgegevens worden opgeslagen), toetsenbordfocus wordt niet gewijzigd.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>
